Trade/Device Name(s): Bionime Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System GM720
Bionime Rightest Professional Blood Glucose Monitoring System GM720
Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System GM720
Rightest Professional Blood Glucose Monitoring System GM720
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Rightest Professional Blood Glucose Meter GM720
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bionime Rightest GM720 blood glucose monitoring systems using electrochemical detection for quantitative glucose measurement in blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary, venous, and arterial whole blood samples for monitoring diabetes control; Rightest GM720 for single-person self-testing, Rightest Professional GM720 for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings.
